name: Zombase
description:
Goal

  • Survive Through Progressively Harder Waves!
  • Protect your respawn orb or else you can no longer survive and only have one life!
  • Build defenses (Turrets, barriers, walls, fences, etc...) in order to survive into later rounds!

ZOMBIES!!!

  • Runner - Fast zombie but easy to kill!
  • Normal - Just your average Joe!
  • Bosses - Hmmm. I wonder how you could even kill one of these? Well good luck, I guess?

Multiplayer

  • Play with up to 3 other users online
  • Play with up to 3 other users over LAN
